raw_body: WEERASINGHE – MAHESH LAKSHITHA. Deputy General Manager (CEB). Beloved husband of Surakshani, loving father of Devrangee (Attorneyat- Law), father-in-law of Ramitha Jayawardene (Standard Chartered Bank), dear son of Chitra Amarasekara (Retired Teacher – Nalanda) and late Dr. Leslie Weerasinghe, brother of Sanjaya (Intissel Lanka).
